summary: An ordinance granting permission to J. A. Colcock to improve Portion of the Alley in Block 28, Rainier Boulevard 4th Addition adjacent to Lots 9 to 16 inclusive and Lots 30 to 37 inclusive, all in said block, being portion of the alley in the block bounded by Rainier Avenue, Rainier Avenue-Lake Way Overpass southbound off ramp, and Atlantic Street, by Paving and otherwise improving the same, at his own cost and expense.
